abstract: The Beatles are among the last big holdouts from digital music services like iTunes from Apple Inc.
snippet: The Beatles are among the last big holdouts from digital music services like iTunes from Apple Inc.
lead_paragraph: LONDON, April 12  The company that manages the Beatles’ commercial interests and the EMI Group, which holds the rights to the band’s recordings, said on Thursday that they had settled a dispute over royalties, renewing speculation that a deal to release the Beatles’ music in digital form might be near.

headline.main: EMI and Beatles’ Representatives Settle Royalty Dispute, Fueling Speculation on Deal
headline.print_headline: EMI and Beatles’ Representatives Settle Royalty Dispute, Fueling Speculation on Deal

abstract: Quality issues will delay the release, an uncharacteristic schedule slippage that is particularly embarrassing for Apple.
snippet: Quality issues will delay the release, an uncharacteristic schedule slippage that is particularly embarrassing for Apple.
lead_paragraph: SAN FRANCISCO, April 12 — Apple Inc., the computer and consumer electronics company, said Thursday that the introduction of the new version of its flagship Macintosh OS X operating system would be delayed as much as four months because of quality issues.

headline.main: Apple Says It Will Delay OS X Release for 4 Months
headline.print_headline: Apple Says It Will Delay OSX Release For 4 Months
